mapper.select: select bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bDate, bHit, bGroup, bStep, bIndent from mvc_board order by bGroup desc,bStep asc
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(bId)+1, 1) AS BID FROM mvc_board
mapper.insert: insert into mvc_board (bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bHit, bGroup, bStep, bIndent) values (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, 0, #{param5}, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update mvc_board set bHit = bHit + 1 where bId = #{param1}
